allow: Bash(sql="SELECT * FROM \(SELECT a, b, c, d FROM \(SELECT a, sum\(r\) AS b, sumForEach\(r\) AS c FROM \(WITH date - install_date AS visit_day SELECT a, b, retention\(visit_day = 0\) AS r FROM \(SELECT a, b, c FROM t1 WHERE a BETWEEN 1 AND 2 UNION ALL SELECT a, b, c FROM t2 WHERE a BETWEEN 1 AND 2\) GROUP BY a, b\) GROUP BY a\) ARRAY JOIN c AS rr, [0, 1, 3] AS d\)")
